alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:18PM CDT until June 10 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR EASTERN THOMAS...NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...SHERIDAN...GRAHAM AND GOVE COUNTIES... At 1118 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Dresden to 8 miles northeast of Park to 6 miles southeast of Gove, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported 55-60 mph winds in Gem, Kansas. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hill City, Bogue and Nicodemus. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 71 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
